page-loader.title: Welcome to Bashkent Residence
texts: Bashkent Residence is your home in the historic center of Bukhara
The complex includes a closed courtyard, a children's playground, a gym ...

page-loader.title: About the complex
texts: Bashkent Residence is a residential complex in the historic center of Bukhara
1600 apartments in 10-12 storey buildings with 2 elevators, a freight elevator, garbage chute and video surveillance.

page-loader.title: Reliability, verified by time
texts: The developer is DUNE GROUP. Since 2019, DUNE GROUP has been implementing ambitious construction projects in Uzbekistan, combining technical expertise and a sense of architectural tact.
The company is focused on sustainable development, safety, technology, and architectural expression.

page-loader.title: Architecture of a new lifestyle
texts: Bashkent Residence is designed as a closed quarter with full infrastructure.

The complex includes 38 residential buildings, built using monolithic technology, with enhanced sound insulation, thoughtfully designed entrance groups, high-speed passenger and freight elevators, and facade cladding made of artificial liquid stone.

page-loader.title: An environment that makes you want to live
texts: The complex covers 103,446 m², with almost a third dedicated to green areas and recreational spaces.

page-loader.title: Apartments that breathe
texts: Each apartment in Bashkent Residence is not just a home, but a personal space where you can comfortably live, relax, raise children, and welcome guests.

page-loader.title: Infrastructure and amenities
texts: Bashkent Residence is not just a residential complex, it is a thoughtfully designed living environment.
